title: Understanding Emotional Dysregulation
text: Emotional dysregulation refers to difficulties in managing and responding to emotional experiences in a socially acceptable manner.

title: Identifying Emotional Dysregulation
text: Consider how emotional dysregulation might manifest in everyday situations. Think about how someone might react when they are unable to control their emotions.

hintAnswer: where an individual is unable to control their feelings and emotions
title: Characteristics of Emotional Dysregulation
text: Which of the following best describes emotional dysregulation?
choices: where an individual is unable to control their feelings and emotions
hand flapping, body rocking, repeating words, or placing toys in the same order all the time
difficulty paying attention, difficulty controlling impulsive behaviors, or excessive activity
